+error[E0277]: `std::rc::Rc<()>` cannot be sent between threads safely

+   = note: required because it appears within the type `impl std::future::Future`

+  --> $DIR/async-fn-nonsend.rs:49:1
+   |

+  --> $DIR/async-fn-nonsend.rs:56:5

@@ -0,0 +1,8 @@
